sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Form, Button, Row, Col, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; export default class UpdateEvent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); console.log("props update", props); this.state = { title: "", place: "", description: "", typeEvent: "", urlEvent: "", price: 0, nbrPlace: 0, startEvent: new Date(), endEvent: new Date(), }; } componentDidMount() { axios .get( `${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}api/event/` + this.props.match.params.id ) .then((res) => { this.setState({ title: res.data.title, place: res.data.place, description: res.data.description, typeEvent: res.data.typeEvent, urlEvent: res.data.urlEvent, price: res.data.price, nbrPlace: res.data.nbrPlace, startEvent: res.data.startEvent, endEvent: res.data.endEvent, }); }) .catch((err) => console.log("error from updatevent")); } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; onSaveEvent = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = { title: this.state.title, place: this.state.place, description: this.state.description, typeEvent: this.state.typeEvent, urlEvent: this.state.urlEvent, price: this.state.price, nbrPlace: this.state.nbrPlace, startEvent: this.state.startEvent, endEvent: this.state.endEvent, }; axios .put( `${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}api/event/` + this.props.match.params.id, data ) .then((res) => { this.props.history.push("/list-event/" + this.props.match.params.id); }) .catch((err) => { console.log("Error in UpdateBookInfo!"); }); }; render() { return (
Titre Lieu Type d'évennement Prix: Nombre de places max: Date debut: Date fin: Lien Reservartion: Description de l'évennement
); } } /*
